meanings.sent1: The superhero's supereffective powers saved the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: The medicine was supereffective in curing the illness.
meanings.sent3: The magician's supereffective wand made everyone disappear!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as supereffective as a ray of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The supereffective vacuum cleaner sucked up all the dirt in seconds.

meanings.definition: Having a greater than usual effect.
meanings.sent1: The new cleaning product was supereffective at removing stains.
meanings.sent2: The supereffective strategy led to a quick victory in the game.
meanings.sent3: The supereffective alarm clock woke him up with a loud bang!
meanings.sent4: Her words were as supereffective as a powerful spell cast on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The supereffective fertilizer made the plants grow twice as fast.
